ComicInfo.Summary:
Uncle Creepy is back with the third thick and icky issue of Creepy! This issue Doug Moench and Angelo Torres team up to tell a tale of demonic devotion and organized crime, Joe Harris and Jason Shawn Alexander wrap their warped three-parter, "The Curse," and a weird revisionist look back at the fall of the Nazi empire reveals a shocking truth-evil never dies! Plus an all-new Loathsome Lore, a bonus Creepy classic story, and more!
*Story Titles* X-Change - Part One In which unspeakable evil takes unrecognizable form.
Pelted Remember, don't let work get under your skin.
The Curse - Part Three Our third and final chapter starring Mommy's Little Monster.
Maquiladora A real skinflint discovers the true cost of labor outsourcing.
Loathsome Lore Lycanthropy, you were it well
A Creepy Classic - "The Disintegrator"
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/creepy-3-x-change-pelted-the-curse-maquiladora-loa/4000-214703/
